actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To amend section 225 of the Federal Salary Act of 1967 to provide that no salary increase under that section shall become effective until the first day of the succeeding Congress.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Salary Act of 1967 to provide that the rates of pay recommended by the President shall be effective at the beginning of the next Congress.

titles.title: To amend section 225 of the Federal Salary Act of 1967 to provide that no salary increase under that section shall become effective until the first day of the succeeding Congress.
